comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Countess Cassini was the niece of the Russian Ambassador, and quite popular in Washinton society: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D0CE1D8103DE633A... Comte Cassini, Master of the Imperial Court, was Ambassador Extraordinary & Plenipotentiary of Russia from 1898 to 1905, ref. www.state.gov/s/cpr/94409.htm and Dean of the Diplomatic Corps from 1903 to 1905: www.state.gov/s/cpr/93591.htm
